languages.text: "Прекрасно. Приятно говорить с равным — в присутствии сильных мира сего я, признаться, теряюсь..." {n}Бастьян кротко улыбается.{/n}
"Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прекрасно. Приятно говорить с равным — в присутствии сильных мира сего я, признаться, теряюсь..." {n}Бастьян кротко улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I tend to find myself at a loss in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}
"Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I tend to find myself at a loss in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}
"Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

languages.text: 「素晴らしい。対等な方とお話しできて嬉しいです。あまりに偉い方の前だと緊張してしまうので…」{n}バスティアンは恐縮するように笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい。対等な方とお話しできて嬉しいです。あまりに偉い方の前だと緊張してしまうので…」{n}バスティアンは恐縮するように笑った。{/n}

languages.text: “那真是太棒了，我很高兴能和与地位对等的人谈话。老实说，我在当权者面前会有些不知所措……”{n}巴斯蒂安温和地笑了笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那真是太棒了，我很高兴能和与地位对等的人谈话。老实说，我在当权者面前会有些不知所措……”{n}巴斯蒂安温和地笑了笑。{/n}

languages.text: «Estupendo. Es un placer tratar con iguales. Si le soy sincero, me pongo un poco nervioso delante de los mandamases...». {n}Bastian sonríe dócilmente{/n}.
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estupendo. Es un placer tratar con iguales. Si le soy sincero, me pongo un poco nervioso delante de los mandamases...». {n}Bastian sonríe dócilmente{/n}.

languages.text: « Excellent. C'est un plaisir de pouvoir échanger avec {mf|un confrère|une consœur}. Je dois vous avouer que je suis quelque peu mal à l'aise en présence des très hauts dignitaires... » {n}ajoute Bastian avec un sourire timide.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Excellent. C'est un plaisir de pouvoir échanger avec {mf|un confrère|une consœur}. Je dois vous avouer que je suis quelque peu mal à l'aise en présence des très hauts dignitaires... » {n}ajoute Bastian avec un sourire timide.{/n}

languages.text: "Ausgezeichnet. Es ist mir eine Freude, mit {mf|einem|einer} Gleichgestellten zu sprechen – ganz ehrlich, die Machthaber hier machen mich langsam etwas nervös ..." {n}Bastian lächelt dünn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ausgezeichnet. Es ist mir eine Freude, mit {mf|einem|einer} Gleichgestellten zu sprechen – ganz ehrlich, die Machthaber hier machen mich langsam etwas nervös ..." {n}Bastian lächelt dünn.{/n}

languages.text: "Fevkalade. Bir mevkidaşımla konuşmak benim için büyük mutluluk. Açıkçası insan, nüfuzlu bir şahsın huzurunda hafiften geriliyor." {n}Bastian çekingence tebessüm ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Splendid. It's a pleasure to be speaking with an equal — truth be told, I get a little flustered in the presence of the powers that be..." {n}Bastian smiles meekly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fevkalade. Bir mevkidaşımla konuşmanın, beni ne kadar mutlu ettiğini anlatamam. Dürüst olmam gerekirse bu kadar güçlü insanların huzurundayken…" {n}Bastian çekingence tebessüm ediyor.{/n}
